basic_info.description:
I'm Olli Paloviita, a software engineer from Finland.

I am currently looking for a master's thesis / graduate position in solving challenges related to new web technologies, security, cloud computing or algorithms. I like to bring new ideas forward and I enjoy learning new skills. I am a team player who wants to help and learn from others.

projects.title: classified.html
projects.description: Portable offline encryption solution that stores everything into a single .html file, which can be accessed from terminal and browser. No dependencies, fully written in Vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: sshkeyboard
projects.description: The only Python keyboard event callback library that works everywhere, even when used through an SSH connection (hence the name). Documentation build process and running tests/formatters is 100% automated

projects.title: Firebase Auth
projects.description: My custom authentication solution to build and deploy mobile friendly websites with authentication and realtime database connection quickly. It leverages Firebase Authentication, but has an improved ui and has more features.

projects.title: minimal-password-prompt
projects.description: The most light weight npm package for getting secret user input through terminal in Node.js. No external dependencies.
